note: HK Urbex (Hong Kong Urban Exploration) is an anonymous, grassroots collective that seeks to unearth and document hidden sites in and around Hong Kong. Beyond the shimmering skyscrapers and glitzy malls, the intrepid explorers reveal another side of Hong Kong and the Asian cities they visit, immortalising and bringing undisclosed nonspaces to light. We are a motley crew of photographers, film makers, journalists, writers and adrenaline junkies.
